note:
Anthropologist working on the ā̤̓̍͘r̴̨̦͕̝t̲̂̓ͩ̑s̠҉͍͊ͅ o̯̱̊͊͢f̵͖̜̉ͅ ẹ̿͋̒̕ṇ̤͛̒̍t̲̂̓ͩ̑r̴̨̦͕̝ā̤̓̍͘p̞̈͑̚͞ḿ̬̏ͤͅẹ̿͋̒̕ṇ̤͛̒̍t̲̂̓ͩ̑, captivating counterurbanisms, undercommons designs. Co-editor, Cultural Anthropology

Free Culture and the City, a history and ethnography of how hackers, squatters, and commoners designed climates of methods for an intransitive urbanism in Madrid, is out with Cornell UP February 2023 https://www.cornellpress.cornell.edu/book/9781501767180/free-culture-and-the-city/#bookTabs=1
